lead_paragraph: Lebron James, accused of quitting on his team too early in his previous game, scored 19 points with a season-high 12 assists Thursday night to lead the Cleveland Cavaliers past the Chicago Bulls
snippet: Lebron James, accused of quitting on his team too early in his previous game, scored 19 points with a season-high 12 assists Thursday night to lead the Cleveland Cavaliers past the Chicago Bulls
